testimonials.name: Virgi J
testimonials.text: Something within me is shifting—quietly, but with real power. My world feels lighter, clearer. I approach life and business with a sharper focus and deeper sense of purpose.
testimonials.transformation: From Hidden Potential to Authentic Power

testimonials.name: Simeon Mihinga
testimonials.text: Pivot Simply is really an ideal business coaching programme for both men and women, especially those fearing to start and grow their businesses.

testimonials.name: Caroline Beattie
testimonials.text: I joined the Conscious Creator Membership and this is the best way I have invested in myself. An interesting road to discovery with usable tools for everyday self care and healing.
